meanings.definition: To thicken or congeal, as a liquid.
meanings.sent1: Stirring the mixture slowly inspissates the sauce.
meanings.sent2: The cornstarch inspissates the soup, making it creamy.
meanings.sent3: The magic potion inspissates instantly, surprising the wizard.
meanings.sent4: Time inspissates our memories, making them more vivid.
meanings.sent5: The cold weather inspissates the chocolate, turning it into a solid block.

meanings.definition: To make or become dense or more concentrated.
meanings.sent1: Adding more sugar inspissates the syrup.
meanings.sent2: The fog inspissates, reducing visibility on the road.
meanings.sent3: The mystery inspissates as the detective uncovers more clues.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room inspissates, making the silence unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The emotions inspissate in his heart, weighing heavily on his mind.
